DOC.brief_summary: R(+) pramipexole dihydrochloride monohydrate [R(+)PPX], an experimental neuroprotective drug, is provided in this open label extension study to ALS patients who have participated in earlier clinical protocols.
DOC.brief_title: Treating Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS) With R(+) Pramipexole Dihydrochloride Monohydrate at 60 mg/Day
DOC.criteria: Definite diagnosis of ALS No prior participation in R(+)PPX clinical studies
